allEvents.desc: Explore the future of #Web3 at the Beyond Blockchain: Hashgraph Hackathon - the virtual hackathon designed for creative experimentation and innovation!

allEvents.title: Social Summer of Code
allEvents.desc:
Social Summer of Code (SSOC) is a program that aims to connect students with open-source organisations and projects to encourage their contribution to the open-source community. The program is run by the Social (Formally Script Foundation) organisation.
This time participants will able to build their own open source projects where they will be guided at every part of the stage with a 1:1 mentor for them

allEvents.title: Hack-A-Bot
allEvents.desc: Hack-A-Bot, is organised in association with UiPath, ACM VVCE, and Code club on 13-May-2023 open to various colleges.  The hackathon will have a specific focus on automation technology, and students will be encouraged to develop creative solutions to real-world problems using UiPath's platform. We believe that this event will not only enhance our students' technical skills but also provide them with exposure to industry professionals and opportunities for networking.

allEvents.title: Think-Tank Ideathon 2023
allEvents.desc: ThinkTank Ideathon is an ideation competition to be conducted by the AIML Society at Chandigarh University Campus from 24-26 April 2023. The event aims to bring together individuals from diverse backgrounds to brainstorm and develop innovative ideas related to Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

allEvents.title: Innoverse
allEvents.desc: A 24-hour hackathon, which will be conducted in hybrid mode, i.e, in both online and offline mode. It is an intensive, brainstorming event where individuals from different backgrounds, skills and interests cover to diagnose predefined problems, identify the best opportunities and ideate the most viable solution. At Innoverse, we bring open-source enthusiasts and entrepreneurs together and share new ideas and learn from industry experts. “INNOVATION is taking two things that exist and putting them together in a new way. What good is an idea if it remains an idea? TRY. EXPERIMENT. FAIL.TRY AGAIN. CHANGE THE WORLD.”

allEvents.title: Evolute
allEvents.desc: We believe in developing a pragmatic environment in our campus, so we will encourage hardware and software based problem statements, every team must have a prototype for their solution and the presentation must be appreciable.

allEvents.title: House of Hackers
allEvents.desc: House of Hackers is first of its kind 36-hours hackathon ever organized in Jharkhand bringing together tech individuals to build and solve problems in a collaborative manner.

allEvents.title: MPGI Hacks
allEvents.desc: MPGI HACKS – 2023 is an event organized by the technical club of CSE department of MPGI (Tech-E-Clan). This event aims to bring like-minded coders and enthusiasts from all over the nation together, and inculcate coding culture among the students of the institute through its programming Hackathon. We aspire to recognize the student’s limitless potential to tackle real world problems of public interest, in a short span of time utilizing the complete freedom for use of concepts and platform.

allEvents.title: Solution Sprint
allEvents.desc: Solution-Sprint is a one-of-a-kind technical event that drives around the latest technologies in the talk about Artificial intelligence, machine learning and data science.  The students need to register in teams of 3-4 members, work on the dataset provided to them on the day of the event work, that is, clean processes and standardize the data according to the stated problem and create a Machine learning Model to bring out the most efficient solution possible. In a 4-Hour run, the students need to bring out the possible solutions using software like  Jupiter, Google Colab, Kaggle etc., Results will be declared on the bases of the efficiency of the models and in cases of collisions the breakthrough will be produced on the bases of the analysis and pre-processing done on the dataset provided.

allEvents.title: Megahack 3.0
allEvents.desc: We are the third edition of a hackathon conducted by and for students at St. John College of Engineering and Management (SJCEM). SJCEM aims to encourage technical innovation and highlight students' abilities and skills throughout this hackathon. We intend to attract the finest and brightest students not only from SJCEM as well as from other universities/institutions throughout India. The event provides a chance for hackers to exchange ideas, learn further information, and make connections for future collaborations. We cordially invite all technophiles to this exciting Hackathon...!!!

allEvents.title: BuildSV23
allEvents.desc: BuildSV23 , an online hackathon event with the theme of Healthcare , open theme and web developments is a competition which wants to promote innovation for the good of the society and believes that problem solving lies within the heart of innovation . It is a 48-hour long hackathon which will take place in online mode and promoting generation of new ideas and solutions for the good of the society.

allEvents.title: DComm VALHALLA - Code for better future
allEvents.desc: Build apps capable of taking millions of users on journeys they’ve never been on before. Simple. Scalable. Secure.

allEvents.title: HACKGLB
allEvents.desc: HACKGLB is ready for it's 2023 edition. It is an exciting learning opportunity for students who are passionate about technology and are interested in solving real-world problems with cutting-edge solutions.  With the first edition of HACKGLB '23, we're hoping to see much more innovative, improved and effective solutions to the issues at hand and share them with the rest of the world by bringing back the community of student developers together yet again.

allEvents.title: Poornima Hackathon
allEvents.desc: Poornima Hackathon 2023, aims to raise perfectionist life in India and comprehensive development of India. It will congregate all streams of engineers to deliberate on the innovation and technological advancement in developing smarter technologies for building efficient, sustainable and decent quality life in India.  The theme of Poornima Hackathon "To build innovative solutions for SMART CITIES". Emphasize of Hackathon is a space in which developers, entrepreneurs, designers, professors, researchers and persons attentive in making their city a better place, can gather in a collaboratively fashion a solution that makes our city more efficient and intelligent. This event plays a significant role in ingenious creativity, flighting of imagination and funneling for self-reliant India, remodeling commence.

allEvents.title: Hack the Winter
allEvents.desc: Hack The Winter is a Community-organized saga of 30 days of open-source events focused around multiple hot text stacks in which attendees get hands-on coding experience by building real-world projects under the guidance of mentors. Join this venture with your very own technical leads from the corporate world guiding you throughout your journey.

allEvents.title: VinHack
allEvents.desc: VinHack is a 36-hour hybrid hackathon that encourages collaboration, learning and innovation through brainstorming groundbreaking ideas and generating prototypes that solve real-world problems. Conducted in 3 rounds, teams of 1-4 members will be provided with an ideal platform to analyze the problem statements and develop algorithms to implement their solutions. VinHack also incorporates guest speaker sessions and fun games to push our coders to achieve their greatest potential and expand their technical knowledge and skills

allEvents.title: Hackerrupt '22
allEvents.desc:
Vidyavardhaka College of Engineering brings you a unique and golden opportunity to showcase your talent in developing innovative solutions to the exciting challenges offered by the industries. A team could select a company-specific problem statement for the event and start implementing feasible solutions. Teams opting for the company-specific problem statements will be mentored by industry experts from the respective organization during the events. Teams may be offered job/internship opportunities and other goodies by respective organizations for innovative solutions to company-specific problems. ​ A team can also opt for Open Ended problem statement.

Our Official Website : hackerrupt.com

Direct Registration: hackerrupt.com/registrartion

Problem Statements: hackerrupt.com/problem_statements

allEvents.title: GIH CODEFIESTA 1.O
allEvents.desc:
The GIH CODEFIESTA 1.0 Hackathon, which is a part of JIGYASA Annual Technical Fest, is a 24-Hour long Hackathon that gives you an opportunity to build something unique to solve problems from various spheres of modern human life.

Use this hackathon to launch your big idea and potentially get continuity grants to turn your idea into a real-world product!

allEvents.title: SOS TECH HACK
allEvents.desc: SOS TECH HACK is a community-focused Hackathon, designed especially for the community's needs. Whether you are a beginner or an expert, here is a perfect chance to showcase your skills and witness a competitive yet inclusive community around it. This year it is going to be organized from 10/10/2022 in online mode.

allEvents.title: Hack @ NITRA
allEvents.desc: This is a theme-based hackathon where everyone has to choose one or the other theme of his/her choice, work on the same, and submit it before the end of the deadline. You'll find the respective problem statements inside every theme.

allEvents.title: HackCBS 5.0
allEvents.desc:
Did somebody just mention an offline hackathon? That’s right because hackCBS is all set to return with an offline arena for the warriors of code!

At hackCBS, we provide a tranquil and welcoming environment where you will be completely free to develop a product, pick up new skills, and along with that, we'll also give you the chance to network with leaders in the hacker community.

We welcome novices and veterans alike making sure they are nourished with action-oriented learning through a number of workshops led by industry experts and multiple other network strengthening activities.

Over 1,000 hackers from all over the country competed for the top spot last year, writing over 50,000 lines of code in a single 24-hour period and guzzling more than 10,000 cups of coffee. But this time it’s going to be different, ‘coz this time it’s going to be even grander.

Website: https://hackcbs.tech/

allEvents.title: H2STC- Hack-O-October -  Deogiri Institute of Engineering and Management Studies
allEvents.desc: H2STC DIEMS Innovators Hackathon is here for technology enthusiast by H2S and Deogiri Institute Of Engineering And Management Studies. Here we are to celebrate Hactoberfest. Hacktoberfest can be an especially welcoming time to dip your toes into open source contributions for the first time. Hacktoberfest can be great for finishing off a project, or starting something fresh. Maintainers are the keystone of open source. This year’s Hacktoberfest has a new, added focus: empowering open source maintainers. Participate in OpenSource projects and make contributions for a great experience, a chance to win cool swags, and other benefits. Start your OpenSource Journey. Get chance to explore Git-Github with Hactoberfest.

allEvents.title: H2STC- Hack-O-October - Budge  Institute of Technology
allEvents.desc: Show off what you have learnt during hacktoberfest! Build new projects using your newly acquired skills or polish your old project to showcase here! Since, this year,Hacktoberfest as included no code & design elements, you can also submit your designs and Ui/ux prototypes. Apart from these, you are free to use any project which has not breached community and contributing guidelines. You can submit coding solutions if you may, but developer projects might fetch you brownie points! We will be judging on your execution, idea, creativity and hackers-favourite ideas. We wont be having any specific tracks, so feel free to build what you want to!

allEvents.title: H2STC- Hack-O-October ABESIT
allEvents.desc: H2STC Hack-O-October ABESIT is flagship of H2STC Hack-O-October comes up with the perfect opportunity to get involved in the open source community and make your mark on the world. There are so many great projects out there that could use your help, so get hacking!

allEvents.title: Technorax V 8.0
allEvents.desc: T-Hacks 5.0 is a 24-Hours virtual Hackathon where you will get the opportunity to interpret real-world problems by revamping them into something unusual. There are numerous themes to test your problem-solving skills. The theme for IEEE day is “Leveraging Technology for a Better Tomorrow”. While the world benefits from what’s new, IEEE focuses on what’s next. You can pick any theme and leverage technology to build solutions for real-life problems. Build the ideas you believe in and make a difference!

allEvents.title: Codertine
allEvents.desc: CODERTINE 3.0 is a 2 hours inter-college online coding competition organised by RGIT Codecell in collaboration with RGIT CESS where students will be provided with problem statements that will revolve around the concepts of Competitive Programming

allEvents.title: Robota
allEvents.desc:
The annual robotics hackathon is conducted by the KGEC Robotics Society. In this hackathon, there will mainly be three domains, namely, Electronics and IoT, Machine Learning, and Mechatronics and Robotics. This hackathon will contain very beginner-friendly topics so that everyone with different levels of experience can easily participate in it. However, performance will be measured in terms of the different aspects of the competition, including teamwork and coordination, quality of the solution, and other aspects mentioned on the website:

ROBOTA (kgec-robotics-society.github.io)

allEvents.title: HackOut'22
allEvents.desc:
Hackathon is an event where computer programmers, software developers, and technological enthusiasts work intensively over a short period on software projects. Hackathon aims to encourage experimentation and creativity that is challenge oriented. The Hackathon phenomenon has emerged as a practical approach to promote innovation alongside digital technology for various fields.

Hackout’19 was organized in DA-IICT as one of the pre-fest events of Synapse. It was a 36 hours event where students from all over Gujarat took part enthusiastically. The students come up with practical solutions in the 36 hours. The event witnessed the participation of over 90 teams, comprising 3-4 participants in each group.

Hackout’21 was a virtual Hackathon conducted during the pandemic.

This year we are back offline. HackOut'22 will be a solid but fun 72 hours of your time in Hackathon wherein the tactical teamwork, innovative ideas, and your journey from project to product, ideas to action, and learning will be judged in a place. REGISTER FAST!! 

We will also be accepting on-spot registrations this time.

allEvents.title: Codeissance
allEvents.desc:
"Innovation is taking two things that already exist and putting them together in a new way"

⚡ TSEC CodeStorm⚡

presents

🔥 CODEISSANCE🔥

A 24 hour 🕐 offline hackathon where your skills and our platform will help you build amazing projects worth showing on your resume🤩

DOMAINS🖥️ :

1. Website and app development

2. BlockChain

3. Social Cause

TEAM SIZE👥:

2-4 members

PRIZES WORTH 💸 :

🥇 1st Prize : ₹ 25,000

🥈 2nd Prize : ₹ 15,000

🥉 3rd Prize : ₹ 10,000

REGISTRATION FEE : ₹500 per team

LOCATION📍: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Bandra West, Mumbai-400028

DATE📆 : 23rd- 24th September, 2022

Get your laptops and brains ready to join us for a worthwhile experience 🥳

Last Date Of Registration-18th September, 2022

allEvents.title: Hack The Mountains 3.0
allEvents.desc: Hack The Mountains is a community-focused Hackathon, designed especially for the needs of the community. Whether you are a beginner or an expert, here is a perfect chance to showcase your skills and witness a competitive yet inclusive developer community around it.

allEvents.title: Web3Hack
allEvents.desc: CryptoNaukri is providing the best Blockchain developers to the startups by building an innovative learning ecosystem where developers can learn Blockchain development, solve problems during development, gain experience as an aspiring Blockchain developer by working on DAOs open source projects, get a unique identity as a Blockchain developer and get jobs in verified web3 startups across the globe. Web3Hack is a hackathon to empower Web 3 Hacker community, we encourage Blockchain enthusiasts to build some good hacks for the community, our moto is also to involve more beginner hackers and support everyone to solve the shared problems of our society to bring a change in a revolutionary way. We are focusing on creating more learning opportunities along with building and solving.

allEvents.title: HackO' Mania
allEvents.desc: Hack'O Mania is an event hoping to empower young minds by bringing enthusiastic technocrats of various domains under one roof. This new year, the first hackathon is being held by the Technocrats club of The Oxford College of Engineering with the goal to create a sprint-like event, where participants create, hack, and innovate to solve problems while adhering to the spirit of creativity and teamwork. We aim to tackle real-world problems and will be filled with interactive sessions and insightful webinars and talks by renowned speakers of the industries. Hack'O Mania is gonna bring zeal in the participants to turn their ingenious ideas into tangible projects.

allEvents.title: H2STC- Hack-O-October - CU
allEvents.desc: H2STC Hack-O-October H2S CU Chapter would be organizing Hack2skill's version of Hacktoberfest, HACKO-OCTOBER -A month-long annual celebration of open-source projects, their maintainers, and the entire community of contributors.
